BusinessProcessTypeDef.name: BusinessProcessTypeDef
BusinessProcessTypeDef.description: Represents a type of business process within an application domain.

ApplicationUsageType.description: Specifies the application's domain that defines the business process type definition.

Description.description: The description of the business process type definition.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the business process type definition.

Language.description: The language of the business process type definition.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package.

MasterLabel.description: The UI label of the business process type definition.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName notation.
